select id as value,name as name from tst_city where is_delete='0' and parent_id=#{parent_id}
select b.first_pingyin from tst_city as a inner join tst_city as b on a.id=b.parent_id and b.is_delete='0' where a.parent_id='-1' and a.is_delete='0' group by first_pingyin
select b.* from tst_city as a inner join tst_city as b on a.id=b.parent_id and b.is_delete='0' and b.first_pingyin=#{first_pingyin} where a.parent_id='-1' and a.is_delete='0'
